message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering the significant worth this product holds for you personally. I am confident it will exceed your expectations and provide substantial value. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this offer.
